Returns: true if this view can be scrolled in the specified direction, false otherwise.
Parameters: int: Negative to check scrolling left, positive to check scrolling right.
canScrollHorizontally(int).Description: Check if this view can be scrolled horizontally in a certain direction.

setTitle(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the title for this action drawer. If title is null, then the title will be removed.

onPeekContainerClicked(android.view.View.Description: Called when anything within the peek container is clicked. However, if a custom peek view is supplied and it handles the click, then this may not be called. The default behavior is to open the drawer.

Returns: the Menu presented by this view
getMenu().Description: Returns the Menu object that this WearableActionDrawer represents. Applications should use this method to obtain the WearableActionDrawers's Menu object and inflate or add content to it as necessary.

ClassDesc: Ease of use class for creating a Wearable action drawer. This can be used with @B_android#support#wear#widget#drawer#WearableDrawerLayout_E@ to create a drawer for users to easily pull up contextual actions. These contextual actions may be specified by using a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Menu_E@, which may be populated by either: Specifying the app:actionMenu attribute in the XML layout file. Example: Getting the menu with @B_android#support#wear#widget#drawer#WearableActionDrawerView#getMenu_E@, and then inflating it with https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MenuInflater#inflate_E@. Example: For https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Menu_E@, the add methods, https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Menu#clear_E@, https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Menu#removeItem_E@, https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Menu#findItem_E@, https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Menu#size_E@, and https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Menu#getItem_E@ are implemented. For https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MenuItem_E@, setting and getting the title and icon, https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MenuItem#getItemId_E@, and https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MenuItem#setOnMenuItemClickListener_E@ are implemented.
